title: FTX Founder Sam Bankman-Friedâ€™s Political Donations under Scrutiny in SBF Trial
description: Judge Kaplan allows evidence of political donations in Sam Bankman-Fried’s fraud trial, linking them to motive. The trial also includes allegations of cryptocurrency token manipulation and questions about government witnesses’ drug use. U.S. District Judge Lewis Kaplan has issued noteworthy rulings regarding the impending fraud trial of Sam Bankman-Fried, the founder of FTX. In a [...]
